title: Luis Enrique - Wikipedia
snippet: PSG renewed their domestic supremacy in 2024–25, losing no matches in the first 28 and winning the league with six to spare. Enrique also led them to retain the Coupe de France and to the final of the Champions League, where they beat Inter Milan 5–0 to complete a continental treble, the first by a French club, while he became the second manager to achieve this twice. He also guided the side to the final of the 2025 ...

title: List of Paris Saint-Germain FC managers - Wikipedia
snippet: In his three seasons in charge, PSG won three Ligue 1 titles, two Coupe de France, three Coupe de la Ligue, and three Trophée des Champions. Luis Enrique is in second place, with eight trophies, including the UEFA Champions League in 2025 and ...

title: PSG head coach Luis Enrique wins the 2025 Men’s Johann Cruyff Trophy - Yahoo Sports
snippet: PSG head coach Luis Enrique has scooped the first award of the evening for Les Parisiens at the 2025 Ballon d’Or ceremony. The Spaniard has won the Men’s Johann Cruyff Trophy, which is awarded to the best head coach of the previous season.
